message.content:
I need to identify the value that represents the amount of profit the entity retains after all expenses have been deducted from total revenue.

Looking at the cash flow statement, the "Net Profit" line item is what I'm looking for, as it represents the final profit after accounting for all expenses, including operating costs, interest, tax, depreciation, and amortization.

In this cash flow statement, the Net Profit is shown as 56497.85 dated 2024-02-05.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '56497.85'}}
```
